name: MEGA MAID
description:
MEGA MAID IS OUT THERE SUCKING UP DEBRIS AND SATELLITES IN SPACE TO KEEP IT KLEEN!!

I don't know why in caps, but figured its a fit.

This is my submission for CpES GAME JAM, which was extra challenging for me to remake this game with time limitation as I'm also caring for my toddler.

This game requires an XBOX controller and requires an internet connection to fetch Satellite and debris information from Space-Track.org. I don't believe that this project is worth expanding on, so I'm only uploading it here temporary for the Game Jam's sake.

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Download the compressed folder
  2. Decompress it
  3. Execute "MEGA MAID.EXE" file
